LanguageData.LTO.NoAltTextureError: Cannot disable: there is no alternative texture.
LanguageData.LTO.OverwriteError: Terrain Overhaul's texture is being overwritten by {0}.\nTo fix this, change the mod load order to have Terrain Overhaul load after {0}.
LanguageData.LTO.RequireRestartMessage: Due to an update, you will need to restart the game in order for disabled textures to be applied.\nSorry for the inconvenience.
LanguageData.LTO.LoadErrorMessage: There were errors during init\nRestarting the game may fix this:
LanguageData.LTO.AddFertilityDescription: The amount of fertility that this surface adds to the existing fertility of the terrain below.\nAdded by the Terrain Overhaul mod.
